Audio.Locality: Hacienda Las Cruces (Area La Ceja), Toche, Municipio Ibague, Tolima
Audio.Author: Bernabe Lopez-Lanus
Audio.Comments: Lek of four individuals whisthling and spectacular display in flight with intrumental sound (wings). Behavior described in López-Lanús, B. (2000) Display and mechanical sound in Dusky Piha. Cotinga: 13:44-45. Coordinates: 4º31´44´´S 75º26´51´´W.
